name: Orion Engineered Carbons S.A.
description: Orion Engineered Carbons S.A. is a leading global supplier of high-performance carbon blacks, used in a wide range of applications including tires, coatings, plastics, and specialty products. Founded in 2011 through the acquisition of the carbon black business of the former Degussa AG, Orion has established itself as a key player in the industry, known for its commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability. The company operates 14 production sites and 4 applied technology centers worldwide, enabling it to serve customers effectively across different markets. Orion's carbon blacks are essential for enhancing the performance and durability of tires, providing heat resistance, electrical conductivity, and color properties in various applications. The company is dedicated to reducing its environmental footprint, employing advanced technologies to minimize emissions and energy consumption in its production processes. Orion's mission is to deliver superior products while fostering sustainable practices and contributing to a circular economy. The company continuously invests in research and development to meet the evolving needs of its customers and the industry, ensuring it remains at the forefront of carbon black technology.
